name: Snake! (cbz0410)
description:
This is my first reverse-engineered classic game in Unity 2D: the classic Snake.

To play, use WASD to move, but you may not move in the direction 180 degrees from which you are already traveling. Collect the apples to grow your character and fill the screen. Be careful, though, as your size quickly becomes your worst enemy!

Source Code (GitHub): https://github.com/cbz0410/SnakeGame
